title: Paravaiye Engu Irukkiraai Song Lyrics Kattradhu Thamizh
stanzas:
Paravaiye Engu Irukkiraai Song Lyrics Kattradhu Thamizh
#Yuvan #NaMuthukumar

Paravaye engu irukkiraai
parakkave ennai alaikiraai
thadaiyangal thaedi
varugiren, anbae. (2)

paarkkum dhisaigal ellaam
paavai mugam varudhe
meengal kaanalin neeril
therivadhundo
kangal poigal solvadhundo

nee poata kadithathin
varigal kadalaaga
adhil midhanthene penne
naanum padagaaga.

Paravaye engu irukkiraai
parakkave ennai alaikiraai
thadaiyangal thaedi
varugiren, anbae.

kadhai pesik kondu
vaa kaatrodu povom
ooraiyaadal theernthalum
un mounangal podhum

indha pul poondum
paravai naamum podhaatha?
ini boologam muzhudhum
azhagaai pogaathaa?

mudhal murai
vazha pudikkudhe
mudhal murai
velicham pirakkudhe
mudhal murai
murindha kilai ondru
pookkudhe.

mudhal murai
kadhavu thirakkudhe
mudhal murai
kaatru varuguthe
mudha murai
kanavu pazhikkuthe
anbae.

idho idho indha
payanathilae
idhu podhum kanmani
verenna naanum kaetpen

indha nigazhgaalam
ippadiye thaan thodaraathaa
en thaniyaana payanangal
indrudan mudiyaadhaa ?

mudhal murai
vazha pudikkudhe
mudhal murai
velicham pirakkudhe
mudhal murai
murindha kilai ondru
pookkudhe.

mudhal murai
kadhavu thirakkudhe
mudhal murai
kaatru varuguthe
mudha murai
kanavu pazhikkuthe
anbae.
